# mdc-button



<!-- Auto Generated Below -->


## Properties

| Property       | Attribute    | Description                                             | Type                           | Default     |
| -------------- | ------------ | ------------------------------------------------------- | ------------------------------ | ----------- |
| `dense`        | `dense`      | Enables dense variant.                                  | `boolean`                      | `undefined` |
| `disabled`     | `disabled`   | Disables button if true.                                | `boolean`                      | `undefined` |
| `href`         | `href`       | Sets a hyperlink & uses anchor tag instead of a button. | `string`                       | `undefined` |
| `icon`         | --           | Icon to render within root element.                     | `HTMLOrSVGElement`             | `undefined` |
| `name`         | `name`       |                                                         | `string`                       | `undefined` |
| `outlined`     | `outlined`   | Enables outlined variant.                               | `boolean`                      | `undefined` |
| `raised`       | `raised`     | Enables raised variant.                                 | `boolean`                      | `undefined` |
| `trailingIcon` | --           | Icon to render on the right side of the element         | `HTMLOrSVGElement`             | `undefined` |
| `type`         | `type`       |                                                         | `string`                       | `undefined` |
| `unelevated`   | `unelevated` | Enables unelevated variant.                             | `boolean`                      | `undefined` |
| `value`        | `value`      |                                                         | `number \| string \| string[]` | `undefined` |
